Title: UPDATE 1-Tesla lowers range estimates as U.S. regulators tighten vehicle-test rules
Summary: Tesla has lowered its driving-range estimates for its electric vehicles in response to a new U.S. government regulation that aims to ensure accurate real-world performance. The move comes after complaints that Tesla's range estimates were overstated, and the company faced scrutiny for rigging the algorithm that controls in-dash range estimates and suppressing customer complaints.
Analysis: The sentiment of the summary is negative because Tesla has lowered its driving-range estimates due to a new government regulation and faced scrutiny for rigging the algorithm and suppressing customer complaints. This could potentially lead to a decrease in consumer trust and negative impact on Tesla's stock.
